subject: Database Select query checks!! newbie
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a method signature like public ArrayList getAllNews() { } which queries the DB and gets the Collection of News Beans in an ArrayList. what kind of
messageBody:
Hi,

I have a method signature like

public ArrayList getAllNews() { }

which queries the DB and gets the Collection of News Beans in an

ArrayList.

what kind of Checks(Tests) can i make (in JUnit) to this method??

Also Can anyone pls throw light on ways & depth of Testing that

could be applied on

web application consisting of Classes,EJBs,Servlets etc..

Is there any site which illustrates Real-time Testing with Junit

apart from addTwoNumbers.etc...stuff ??

Thanks in adv,

Deepak
